description: This property is a 8-minute walk from the beach. This hotel is next to Femøren Metro Station, a 10 minute ride from central Copenhagen and a 3 minute ride from Copenhagen Airport. It offers free gym, sauna and indoor pool access. Park Inn Copenhagen Airport’s rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some rooms have a tea/coffee maker. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Facilities include a solarium, a billiards room and a summer playroom. Brasserie Salt & Pepper offers both Scandinavian and international cuisine. Breakfast is served starting at 5:30 am. Park Inn by Radisson Copenhagen Airport is 199 m from Amager Strand and the Øresund Strait. Field’s shopping center is also nearby. We speak your language! Park Inn by Radisson Copenhagen Airport has been welcoming Booking.com guests since Dec 26, 2008. Hotel Rooms : 295 , Hotel Chain : Park Inn by Radisson
